and people ignore the readme file you have to replace "AVSVideoCoverter.exe" with the cracked one, and place it in the "C:\Program Files (x86)\AVS4YOU\AVSVideoConverter"


IMPORTANT!!!!!!!! to ANYBODY who is getting the error "AVSVideoCoverter.exe has stopped working preferably or ANY other error that involves crashing for Windows 7.



click the Windows logo button in the VERY bottom left, right click computer and select "Properties" a window should pop up click "Advance system settings" now another window should pop up under "Performance" click "Settings" once again another windows should pop up select the tab named "Data Execution Prevention" click Add and ONE more window will pop up. go to were AVS Video Converter is installed for example "C:\Program Files (x86)\AVS4YOU\AVSVideoConverter"

now SELECT AVSVideoConverter.exe and click open click apply then Ok 

NOTE!!!!!!!! this also works with other programs that CRASH such as if you have "Flash Decompiler Trillix" and it wont open ADD it to the list then try running it.

NOW try AVS Video Converter  :) have fun
